item.title: TransferTo Airtime Api Rails 5 Gem
item.author: talk@voxbox.io (Matteo La Cognata)
item.description: TransferTo helps businesses offer airtime top-ups, goods and services, and mobile money around the world in real time. The TransferTo Airtime Mobile Top-up product allows the transfer of small values to over 4.5 billion mobile phones worldwide. The Airtime API however does not respond according to the JSON API specification. The t2_airtime gem attempts to fix that, and also includes Airtime method helpers you can use to roll your own Top-Up solution.

item.title: About me
item.author: talk@voxbox.io (Matteo La Cognata)
item.description: My name is Matteo La Cognata. I am a Telecommunication Engineer with a passion for software, nature, music & cooking. I am also a dad, and I love my family and my cat. what is Voxbox Voxbox is a collection of open-source and propietary components I developed to orchestrate telephony services on a single or clustered group of servers, tailored to the carrier wholesale market. Voxbox is built for Debian servers with Freeswitch, PostgreSQL and Ruby.
